original_text: For they have taken of their daughters for themselves, and for their sons: so that the holy seed have mingled themselves with the people of those lands: yea, the hand of the princes and rulers hath been chief in this trespass.
korean_text: 그들의 딸을 맞이하여 아내와 며느리로 삼아 거룩한 자손이 그 지방 사람들과 서로 섞이게 하는데 방백들과 고관들이 이 죄에 더욱 으뜸이 되었다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: For they have taken of their daughters for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 딸들을 자신들을 위해 데려왔으니

sentences.original_text: so that the holy seed have mingled themselves
with the people of those lands
yea, hand of princes and rulers
hath been chief in this trespass
